name: The 6th International Conference on Microbiology, Virology and Immunology
content: The 6th International Conference on Microbiology, Virology and Immunology (CMVI 2023) will be held during December 8-10, 2023 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Microbial Genetics, General Viral Science, Antiviral Medicine, Diagnostic and early detection of viral infections, Cellular Immunology, Vaccines, etc. CMVI 2023 dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
